title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.7 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.7 - Enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Operation of
parking lots and traffic directions on all college roadways will be
accomplished under the direction of the Chief of University Police. (b) Since the operation of a vehicle on
campus is for the convenience of the individual, the college assumes no
responsibility for the vehicle, its contents or for any situation resulting
from bringing and operating the vehicle on campus. This includes any damage
caused by towing a vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
573.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
